# This is Jeff's awesome website

Here's a gif of elmo

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/drXGoW1iudhKw/giphy.gif)

You can still use R

```{r message = F}
library(tidyverse)

plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = runif(100),
    y = 1 + 2 * x +rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
